properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins. Used by CorsConfig to configure cross-origin resource sharing.

properties.name: cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed HTTP methods for CORS requests. Used by CorsConfig.

properties.name: cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed HTTP headers for CORS requests, or '*' for all headers. Used by CorsConfig.

properties.name: cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether to allow credentials in CORS requests. Used by CorsConfig.
